Posts.Content: Hello, can I join your group? I have my first chemo tomorrow (eeek) and am really nervous. I'm having 3xFEC followed by 3 x DocT (or something??).  Just worried as don't know what the side effects might be for me etc.  Will be good to be in a group of others going through chemo too. Thanks!
Posts.Title: *** August Chemo Club ***
